entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , New Glasgow
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:54 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.6°C

entry.title: Sunday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Clearing. High plus 4 except zero along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4 except zero along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Sunday 12 March 2023
